title: Implement genre_based_discovery function
description: Implement genre_based_discovery using Spotify recommendations API with seed genres, caching 20 tracks per genre

title: Order rolling playlist tracks by most recent first
description: Update make-rolling.py to sort tracks by added_at date (most recent first) when adding to playlist. Currently tracks are added in the order they were fetched from the API.

title: Test and validate generative weekly mix
description: Manual testing of playlist generation to verify ~8% generative tracks, discovery logging, and all constraints honored

title: Implement artist_based_discovery function
description: Implement artist_based_discovery using artist_related_artists API, scanning discographies, caching 20 tracks per artist

title: Implement discover_track round-robin strategy
description: Implement discover_track function that alternates between genre-based and artist-based discovery, updating discovery_state and returning track with metadata

title: Integrate generative module into main script
description: Add imports and initialize_discovery call to make-weekly-mix-saved-artists.py with generative_ratio configuration

title: Implement fetch_recent_liked_tracks function
description: Implement fetch_recent_liked_tracks with pagination, 3-month window filtering, and rate limit retry logic

title: Update playlist description on rolling playlist updates
description: When make-rolling.py updates an existing playlist, it only adds/removes tracks but doesn't update the playlist description with the new 'last updated' date. The description is only set when creating a new playlist.

title: Modify main script loop for generative tracks
description: Update main loop in make-weekly-mix-saved-artists.py to alternate between generative and random selection with observability logging

title: Initialize generative discovery module structure
description: Create generative_discovery.py with module interface functions (initialize_discovery, discover_track) and internal function stubs

title: Implement analyze_genres function
description: Implement analyze_genres to extract and rank genres from recent liked tracks, handling missing genre data gracefully

title: Implement analyze_artists function
description: Implement analyze_artists to categorize artists by frequency and return weighted artist mapping
